title: win10下1.7.10崩溃
author: 灬辰
txt_content:
刚换的电脑自带win1 64位，装的Java是8u121的64日志
[01:32:19] [main/INFO]: Setting user: k.k
[01:32:19] [main/INFO]: (Session ID is token:d399fd20d99a48c1b49491545c1222d4:b69c1a03141f3012a1444e89ab62ba7d)
[01:32:19] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.1

replies.author: Jiang_de
replies.txt_content:
Jiang_de 发表于 2017-1-28 01:44
初始化LWJGL时失败，你是不是更新了N卡的驱动,那个驱动有BUG，会导致无法启动MC ...
具体看这里http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=667590

replies.author: Jiang_de
replies.txt_content: 初始化LWJGL时失败，你是不是更新了N卡的驱动,那个驱动有BUG，会导致无法启动MC
